unnormalised: Hey, any news on Jadeja's knee? Hope he recovers soon for the Asia Cup! Last I heard, he was undergoing rehab at NCA, Bangalore since 22/07/2024. Any word on Bumrah's back too? Really need him firing on all cylinders before the T20 World Cup. Doctors said he'd be back by 15/09/2024, 14:00 hrs. Also, is Prithvi Shaw playing any Ranji matches this season after his ankle injury on 01/05/2024, 18:00 hrs? We need those guys back, yaar!
normalised: Hey, any news on Jadeja's knee? Hope he recovers soon for the Asia Cup! Last I heard, he was undergoing rehab at N C A, Bangalore since twenty second july two thousand and twenty four. Any word on Bumrah's back too? Really need him firing on all cylinders before the T two zero World Cup. Doctors said he'd be back by fifteenth september two thousand and twenty four, two P M. Also, is Prithvi Shaw playing any Ranji matches this season after his ankle injury on first may two thousand and twenty four, six P M? We need those guys back, yaar!
